interfaces.name: CardItem
ClickEvent
interfaces.description: Datatype which is emitted when an item should be added

interfaces.name: CollapseState
interfaces.description: All the collapse stated of every group item (horizontal / vertical)

interfaces.name: GroupHeading
interfaces.description: Object for the headings in which you can set color etc.

interfaces.name: GroupKeys
interfaces.description: Group keys to determine the correct groups internally

interfaces.name: Scrollable

injectables.name: TaskboardService

components.name: BoardComponent

inputsClass.name: actionsTemplate
inputsClass.description: Template for actions, add and collapse buttons (see examples)

inputsClass.name: backlogName
inputsClass.description: Name of the backlog row

inputsClass.name: backlogWidth
inputsClass.description: Width of the backlog row, when activated. You can use all valid css units. Default is columnWidth

inputsClass.name: boardName
inputsClass.description: Board name to show between row and column header

inputsClass.name: cellAddNewItems
inputsClass.description: Show add buttons in the cells for columns and rows

inputsClass.name: cellClass
inputsClass.description: Default css class for cell header

inputsClass.name: columnWidth
inputsClass.description: Column width (in px) which is applied to the columns when the content is scollable

inputsClass.name: dragoverPlaceholderTemplate
inputsClass.description: Template for the placeholder element which will be generated when an item is draged over a cell

inputsClass.name: filter
inputsClass.description: Predefined filter for the searchbar. If set, the items are filtered by the term on init.

inputsClass.name: filterOnProperties
inputsClass.description: Specify the properties which will be searched for the given term in filter. If not properties are given, all will be searched

inputsClass.name: filterRowPlaceholder
inputsClass.description: Placeholder for the input with the filter row

inputsClass.name: hAddNewItems
inputsClass.description: Show add buttons on the column headings

inputsClass.name: hCollapsed
inputsClass.description: Columns are collapsed or not on init

inputsClass.name: hGroupKey
inputsClass.description: Key to group data for columns

inputsClass.name: hGroupKeys
inputsClass.description: Grouping keys for columns (if not passed, the keys will be determined out of the items) Caution: If you don't pass any headings manually, only the columns are shown, which have data. If you want to show emtpy rows, please set them

inputsClass.name: hHeaderClass
inputsClass.description: Default css class for column header

inputsClass.name: hHeaderTemplate
inputsClass.description: Template for column headers. Current groupName will be passed (see examples)

inputsClass.name: invertGroupDirection
inputsClass.description: Invert rows and columns

inputsClass.name: items
inputsClass.description: Items to display

inputsClass.name: itemTemplate
inputsClass.description: Template for items to render. "item" object ist passed (see examples)

inputsClass.name: noElementsTemplate
inputsClass.description: Template for collapsed rows to render. "count" object ist passed (see examples)

inputsClass.name: scrollable
inputsClass.description: If set to true, the rows and columns are scrollable and will be out of the viewport. If not set, all rows and column will only use 100% of the parent element (aligned by flex/flex-fill)

inputsClass.name: showBacklog
inputsClass.description: Shows the blacklog on onit

inputsClass.name: showFilterRow
inputsClass.description: Shows the filter row to search items by filter in filterOnProperties array

inputsClass.name: showUngroupedInBacklog
inputsClass.description: All items which can't be grouped into rows and columns are stored into the backlog

inputsClass.name: smallText
inputsClass.description: Decrease overall font size

inputsClass.name: sortBy
inputsClass.description: Sort items by property

inputsClass.name: stickyHorizontalHeaderKeys
inputsClass.description: If set to true, the horizontal group keys are fixed positioned to the top and remain at the top while scrolling. Only applied when scrollable is true

inputsClass.name: stickyVerticalHeaderKeys
inputsClass.description: If set to true, the vertical group keys are fixed positioned to the top and remain at the top while scrolling. Only applied when scrollable is true

inputsClass.name: vAddNewItems
inputsClass.description: Show add buttons on the row headings

inputsClass.name: vCollapsable
inputsClass.description: Allow to collapse the rows

inputsClass.name: vCollapsed
inputsClass.description: Rows are collapsed or not on init

inputsClass.name: vGroupKey
inputsClass.description: Key to group data for rows

inputsClass.name: vGroupKeys
inputsClass.description: Grouping keys for rows (if not passed, the keys will be determined out of the items) Caution: If you don't pass any headings manually, only the rows are shown, which have data. If you want to show emtpy rows, please set them

inputsClass.name: vHeaderClass
inputsClass.description: Default css class for row header

inputsClass.name: vHeaderTemplate
inputsClass.description: Template for row headers. Current groupName will be passed (see examples)

outputsClass.name: dragStarted
outputsClass.description: Fired when the user drags an item. Current item is passed

outputsClass.name: dropped
outputsClass.description: Fired when an item is dropped. Current item is passed

outputsClass.name: elementCreateClick
outputsClass.description: Fired when an add action is click. Current ClickEvent is passed

components.templateData:
{{ backlogName }}
    #{{item.id}} {{ item.name }} {{ item.priority }}
{{ boardName }}
{{ getValue(group) || 'Ungrouped'}}
{{ getValue(vGroup) || 'Ungrouped' }}
#{{item.id}} {{ item.name }} {{ item.priority }}
{{ getItemsOfGroup(vGroup, hGroup).length }} elements (filtered by {{filter}})

components.name: FilterSearchBarComponent
